data.name: Poses for Clip maker
data.detailed_description:
With this Poses DLC for Clip Maker you will get more then 4 500 static poses divided into 140 categories for making excellent videos, movies and clips, visual novels, comics, manga, etc ...

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
data.about_the_game:
With this Poses DLC for Clip Maker you will get more then 4 500 static poses divided into 140 categories for making excellent videos, movies and clips, visual novels, comics, manga, etc ...

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
data.short_description: Poses for Clip maker - get a revolutionary new game and have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips and videos.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC does not include characters or any visible objects. This DLC does not include sex poses, it include only the everyday poses for different life situations.
